alert.note: Alert for Northern Elko County; Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range; South Central Elko County; Southeastern Elko County; Southwest Elko County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 22 at 5:41PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of east central Elko County through 615 PM PDT... At 539 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Ryndon to near Wendover. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40-50 mph, and blowing dust. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Blowing dust could reduce visibilities and make it difficult to travel. Locations impacted include... West Wendover, Wendover, Wells, Montello, Oasis, Clover Valley, Deeth, Ryndon, Pequop Summit, Angel Lake, Moor Summit, Silver Zone Pass, Hd Summit, Star Valley, and Halleck. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northern Elko County; Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range; South Central Elko County; Southeastern Elko County; Southwest Elko County
